title: is diana a god this season? and why is she not being played?
body: i havnt seen a diana in ages. i play her from time to time and she is REALLY strong atm. tanky assassin with high burst. an aoe pull which could set up some serious combos with ori and j4. i played her recently and got a quad as the nexus was about to explode on our team and it ended up being the deciding factor of us winning the game. she seems so powerful in this meta. assassins are not as frequent as b4 and if ur vs an assassin as diana u will crap on them. shes fights tanks and wins, something that assassins cant do. decimates squishies in about 1.2 a second. why is she not played. she is SO POWERFUL

replies.body: Diana has always been a god she is just underrated, I love her because she has so many build paths so you can go whichever way you want with her.

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=dVEnvgEU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-12T04:53:35.777+0000)
>
> Diana has always been a god she is just underrated, I love her because she has so many build paths so you can go whichever way you want with her.

Exactly. 
However this season Diana jungle has got to have one of the fastest clear speeds in the game right now. Her ganks are also quite good but only once shes 6+ and shes deadly once she ganks with a red buff.
But back to what Niji said, she is really underrated and underplayed. But you can take this to your advantage because underplayed champs dont really get nerfed/reworked/banned. Spam her in ranked! ^-^
I play Diana quite a lot in mid. Usually when I have to lane against a Zed.

When people think AP Assassin they go for Le Blanc over Diana.

Diana is super strong and I think if she ever got popular she'd be nerfed. So be thankful she's not.
Oh you sweet summer child. It's da tank meta das y
